channel.title: How do u make an item popup in ur inv when u kill a monster?
channel.description:
okay, my server has the ice mini, but when u kill the skeletal wyvern at the end, you get teled to home, and u got nothing at all. is there any way i can make it that u actually get a reward?
thanks
